Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 60th overall pick, by Washington in 2016...
Traded from Washington to Minnesota on 5/23/2016 (Going to WSH: P D. Fister, P M. Little. Going to MIN: P A. Reinhart Jr., P C. Coplin)...
Injured on 6/20/2017 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Released by Minnesota on 9/28/2018...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/15/2019 to a 3-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
Injured on 4/24/2019 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from New York (A) to Los Angeles (N) on 3/2/2020 (Going to NYA: P K. Zimmer, SS F. Galvis. Going to LAN: SS C. Gehringer Jr., 3B K. Lobdell, P C. Coplin)...
Injured on 6/3/2020 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/10/2020 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/8/2021...
Had first career hit on 7/20/2021, off Christopher Fonseca (PIT)...
